website_summaries.verdict: Frosted window film with an attractive ornate design, adds a nice touch to any window that needs privacy.
pros: Static cling application means no residue left on your window
Nice ornate design adds character to any window
Thick and durable material with easy-to-install static cling application
cons: Can be hard to work out bubbles during application

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is so worth the money! I'm bad at applying stuff like this so I had a few air bubbles left in it after(but not as bad as the 2nd pic lol). I had my boyfriend stand behind it in the picture at night and you couldn't even see a shadow or outline. It's nuts! I got this because I'm not supposed to have cats at my apartment, so i blocked out the window they sit in so light still comes through but they cant be seen from outside! Haha!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Walker

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, functional, and very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: East to install (don't forget to remove the protective film - you barely know it's there because it's so thin, but you have to remove it). It's so easy to install. You just need a spray bottle, a drop or two of liquid dish soap, and a credit card or other straight edge that has curves at the edges (square edges will rip a hole in the plastic). This design is really pretty. It doesn't block out all the light by any means, but it blurs the view from outside. Of course at night, when the room lights are on and it's dark outside, you can still see inside, but only shadows - no detail.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply, offers great privacy and lets a lot of light in
customer_reviews.text: We've been at our house for at least 15 years. And we still have "temporary" paper shades in our bathroom. I decided to replace these "temporary" shades with something more permanent (you can remove them later if you wish to). After my wife agreed to the design, I ordered it and in 2 days, it was here. Installed it according to the instructions (most of it anyway) and voila, you're done. It looks great. I installed it the morning. Towards the afternoon, some bubbles started to appear. Just squeegee them out. And it does offer a lot of privacy while still letting a lot of light in. Well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Emil

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: Looks GREAT! Very easy to use. I a little spritz if windex to the window. Used a credit card to “squeegee” the windex and bubbles out. Used an xacto knife to cut excess off. I have a ton left over so I might cut more “strategic” areas of design and redo. It was super easy!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Nice privacy screen for windows
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty, easy to use, gets compliments. This was easy to put up and came with a tool to cut and a small straight edge. While smoothing out the bubbles, however, the ink in the flowers scratched off a bit, so I had to stop smoothing out the bubbles to prevent lines from forming.
customer_reviews.author: A. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Colors not the same when order more of the same stuff
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 different boxes at 2 different times a week or so from each other realizing I needed more. (I clicked order again so I know they are the same) The colors of the 2 boxes are way off. The black flowers in the first box are black. The second box the flowers are grey. Didn't realize this until I got them up. Maybe if you order exactly what you need at the same time you will get the same colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Privacy and light reducing
customer_reviews.text: Where i live the temperatures during the summer can be in the hundreds! Running the air conditioner constantly can be costly, so i needed a way to help keep the house cool and reduce the bills. This worked perfectly in my bathroom. This helped reduce the heat dramatically, creates privacy and has a pretty floral design. I would have loved to put this throughout the whole house but i didn't want to obstruct my views in all my Windows. Would definitely recommend in places where u want privacy because you can't see in or out of this tint.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Mo

customer_reviews.title: ease of use
customer_reviews.text: This was really very easy to install. However my husband has installed this type of material before so his knowledge made it that much easier. Don't be afraid to make the surface very wet when using this, it makes it that much easier to apply. I was nervous at first but he just got to work and had it applied in no time at all. And it turned out beautiful and is exactly what I was looking for. And the price was reasonable!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Wolff

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful but a pain
customer_reviews.text: I have put others up similar to this one, but this one, the material isn't as good as the others I have bought on Amazon and at my local Lowe's. You can accidentally gouge a hole in this, and scrape off the flower design while using a rubber spatula or a plastic (flimzy) plaster tool. Do i give it a 3 because of the beauty of it, but a 2 for material is thinner than most I have Installed.
customer_reviews.author: janice

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install but does take two people
customer_reviews.text: We have 4 large windows in our master bath but the house next door was able to see in. I had sheets of opaque plastic on the windows for years but they began to get brittle and break, so the privacy film was the answer. A bit tedious to pull up a corner to get backing off, but once the film is placed on the window, it is very secure and does not slide back and forth as you are trying to cut it and fit the sides. Bubbles left between window and film easily wipe away with minimal pressure and again, the film stays securely in place. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: John Swigart

customer_reviews.title: Great for privacy while keeping nearly all the light!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, very easy to install. This film is thick! Because it’s not transparent like other window tint it is very forgiving to put on. No need to worry about getting every little bubble and pie ice of link off the glass...you won’t be able to see that anyway.
customer_reviews.author: B. Swift

customer_reviews.title: Great looking window film
customer_reviews.text: We used this for the windows we have in our garage and they look great. Very classy and the frosted pattern allows some light in without worrying about people peering in. It's been a couple of weeks and the film has stayed on without any problem. As with any window film, glass prep is the most important thing. I only wish the removable backing was solid white to make it easier to draw lines for cutting it.
customer_reviews.author: Chirag S.

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: This privacy film is very pretty, it is a very pretty design. We purchased it because we had new windows installed, and the bathroom windows were clear, no privacy film on them. Installation wasn't too difficult, just getting it cut to the exact right size was a little tricky. It looks great on there, does a great job with privacy you cannot see in or out, however it let's a lot of light in which is good. I would buy another roll, if I needed more. It's been on the windows about a year I believe and we have had no issues with it peeling up, or off the windows, so I'd say it's a good product.
customer_reviews.author: KD Florida

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful.  Be sure and remove transparent film before applying.
customer_reviews.text: Be sure and remove the transparent file from the slick side before applying the film to a glass surface. I failed to fully read the instructions and the film fell off the next day. I read the instructions again and now all is good. We applied them to old windows which provide privacy to the bedrooms in our Airbnb as there is only a half wall deciding them. Very happy with the pattern as it goes well with the decor.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. It adheres with water and a squeegee, and cuts so easily. I did a green self healing mat and rolling cutter. Plus a metal ruler and this stuff just fit right in. A little went a long way too. I ordered four rolls and only needed three. Plus, it lowered the temp in the apartment from sun beams by like half. This was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon De VITO

customer_reviews.title: Does stick in place!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t stick! I followed the process step by step and did everything the package told me to. It looked really good! And it looked like it would stay. The next day...it’s starting to bubble off! I am not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Ladyday

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stuff. We have a glass pane front door (i think it's 12 glass panes) and didn't want to drill into the wooden door to hang a curtain since it's a rental. It takes awhile to cut the pieces if you're covering a ton of area, but beyond that the application process is fairly easy, and we've never had an issue with them to date. Do take note that if you are buying this to block light, a different pattern would probably work better. This one is more for privacy than cutting down on the light, so for about an hour and a half every day it can cast a pretty nasty glare on the TV.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to my bathroom door!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, love it, love it! We bought a house with a master bathroom that had no door. 😲 After installing a clear glass barn door (cheapest solution I could come up with) I realized I needed privacy film on the door. I searched and searched for months for the perfect film with a nice pattern. I'm so glad I found this film. It looks great on the door (even better than picture) and gives the privacy needed on the bathroom door. Great product, went on easy and holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Riff

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use! Just remember it is a pattern and to pay attention when cutting. It's pretty and from 1 foot away, all you can see is shadows of people. Tested to confirm both in the day and at night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally got it to work! REMOVE THE FILM on the back
customer_reviews.text: After giving this product one star and reviewing it poorly, saying the product doesn’t stick, was my mistake. There is a film on the backside that needed to be removed and once I did that, the product is perfect! The only thing I can say is that the directions should have been more clear. I love the pattern and it is definitely private!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great product but hate delivery service
customer_reviews.text: Love the product but only complaint I have is the delivery service they use. These drivers are horrible!!!! I have a gate to enter into my main door entrance and these drivers throw my packages over my gate with force. My gate door is not high they can easily reach in and just drop the box it doesn’t need to be thrown. My product was not damaged but the box was .. it’s not the first time they do that and I have evidence from my security camara
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it.
customer_reviews.text: Complete junk. It’s was not in a sheet it was on a sheet and factory cut around the flower patterns and that area pulled off Separately. I’m very crafty I tried to make it work and couldn’t. Very disappointed and money wasted :(
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: good for privacy
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for this stuff for years. All the others were to narrow to cover the bottom half of my storm door in one piece. I was hoping that it would provide enough privacy that people walking down the sidewalk wouldn't be able to look straight through my living room, and it is performing much better than expected. I can't see out, people can't see in, day and night. I've put it on the sidelights as well now and I'm very pleased with the privacy. I really like the design too, the curls and flowers are light and cheerful.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: So very pretty. Very thick and durable. Have to say the install was not what I expected. Ive installed vinyl for over 20 years, and it was a little difficult. Its a static cling not sticker material, not easy to get the bubbles out. End result is beautiful, but definitely take your time on the install.
customer_reviews.author: Stine

customer_reviews.title: Privacy and Cool
customer_reviews.text: So I live in a townhouse with no AC fornthe summer. I put this up on a few of my windows and a door. It has helped alot with the heat and the cold during the winter months. I absolutely love them. They look beautiful on the windows.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Arnoth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: This item is perfect! I ordered in black and white and used it on all my windows. I live in a first floor apartment and I wanted to be able to have curtains open without blinds so this was so perfect. No one can see in and it allows plenty of light and looks so cute!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Love love love these
customer_reviews.text: This is actually a spectacular buy. So easy to install and the look of them are amazing. They literally change the whole look for the room. They provide privacy in bathroom areas. I actually reorder some more .
customer_reviews.author: Anna R

customer_reviews.title: in order to better conceal the medical supplies that are kept in it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to go on the glass of a cabinet I have, in order to better conceal the medical supplies that are kept in it. It looks really nice, and installation was not too difficult. We like it so much, we are planning on buying another roll for our shower door. Make sure you have a little spray bottle to wet the glass before you place it. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Emily R

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: The film had large flaw that you could not miss and since I bought it for a large window door I couldn’t get around using it. The spot looks horrible and I of course did not realize this until I already cut it and started putting it up.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Stein

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Yes taking protective film of is a bit tricky. It looks good and included tools make it very nice. Razor blade will lock in if you push up and in little loop.
customer_reviews.author: Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase
customer_reviews.text: Read the instructions! It is easy to use and works great! I used it on 2 doors that had panel windows AND I used it on a plastic sky light. It is holding up great and it helps keep rooms cooler and Looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: catq

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This is worth every penny. It comes with a cloth, razor/ruler. It doesn't have a squeegee, I used my own. It is well made, not too thick or thin. I ordered the small size and I'll have enough to use on another window.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A whole new look
customer_reviews.text: Initially was going to replace the door with interior blinds because the existing blinds were chewed up by the previous owners dogs. For a lot less $$ and a little paint and time, the film gave my door a whole new look.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: They don’t give the privacy I want
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think they block as much as I would like them to. You can’t see much from the inside, but it seems like you could see a lot from the outside. I think the view should be reversed, but instructions say you cannot put the film outside.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin A

customer_reviews.title: Don't accept a damaged roll
customer_reviews.text: Nice pattern that allows good privacy and light in at the same time. My roll arrived with a big dent in it (though the package was fine). I assumed that the dent was insignificant, but half the roll is unusable. I recommend you return it if yours arrives as mine did.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and gorgeous.
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! So easy to install and they look great in my room. Total privacy also. I never have to close my blinds now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty pattern
customer_reviews.text: Finally installed this to update my awful flourescent kitchen light... was difficult getting water and air bubbles out. I started off with a squeegee but ended up using a credit card. Took about 45 minutes but it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: cardonut

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I used the product on the lower half of bedroom windows. I am so very pleased with the look and the privacy it offers. Very easy to use. Great quick service. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: grandma lois

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and private
customer_reviews.text: Love this window film. Needed something for our bathroom window and this was it. Pretty floral pattern, let's light in, but neighbors out.
customer_reviews.author: SJH

customer_reviews.title: Window Film Privacy Window Film Frosted Glass Film Static Cling Glass Film
customer_reviews.text: Looks great for my new bathroom window. Easy to install and looks very nice on both sides of the window. No see in but lets light into the room. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Janet M Lane

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: We were changing out our window film and picked this one....we love it! It's so pretty!!!! And it was easy for me to install!
customer_reviews.author: Denise A McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Great value for high quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this door privacy cover. It looks lovely and is easy to cut and install. It gives u privacy but still let’s light in.
customer_reviews.author: O

customer_reviews.title: So much better!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vinyl cling to replace some grandma looking sheers on either side of my front door. They complimented the window in the door and look so much cleaner and prettier. They went on SUPER easy with some water with a little soap.
customer_reviews.author: LHarrington

customer_reviews.title: Love how this looks on my back door
customer_reviews.text: Love how this looks on my back door. Install was really easy, took about 20 minutes. You don't need a spray adhesive, just spray water on the glass first and use a credit card or something similar to get the water and air bubbles out. If you mess up, it's easy to just peel it back off and try again.
customer_reviews.author: Zach P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for something to put on my office doors to "dress" them up, create privacy and didn't want curtains. I am so glad I bought this product. It looks amazing and was so easy to put on the glass. I'll be buying more for another set of windows!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in May 2018. I used dawn and water to attach it and 1 yr later its still there. Never fallen
customer_reviews.author: Melesita

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and work with, tools included. I love that this allows light to come through, while providing the privacy I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: but went up easily, and stays up well
customer_reviews.text: Does not look quite as elegant in person, but it does look lovely on my bathroom window, and I feel much more secure getting out of my shower! My boyfriend installed it for me. It comes with a clear backing that must be peeled off to get it to cling to the glass of the window, but went up easily, and stays up well.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Great decorative window covering.
customer_reviews.text: This window covering was exactly what I was looking for. It provides privacy will creating an ellagant look. It was not hard to put up at all. No mess.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine9190

customer_reviews.title: Not that easy but doable
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is beautiful Not super easy... I don't know how I managed but I did complete the application. 60 bucks for 1 large widows in my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Window privacy screen
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the design..I had a little difficulty with the install but it came out well..
customer_reviews.author: dolores..

customer_reviews.title: Privacy and natural light
customer_reviews.text: Husband likes curtains closed all day for privacy and i like natural light. This was the perfect compromise. We are both happy and it was super easy to cover the lower half of our kitchen windows.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Looks very good on a door.
customer_reviews.text: As described. Used it on a glass door. Very easy to install if instructions are followed right. Very happy. Plan to get some more for patio door.
customer_reviews.author: Ma. Pa.

customer_reviews.title: Sexy window covering
customer_reviews.text: This does the trick. Block folks from seeing inside. So sexy. Many compliments. Easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: pat

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately it did not stay
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, it did not stay. I have had experience applying other static cling window coverings. This one was not good at all. I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks like paw prints from outside!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very good privacy film. I wanted something for our North facing Dining room window without compromising the light we get. You get very good privacy in the night unless you stand too close to the window. No regrets!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this twice and LOVE LOVE LOVE it!!! It's perfect for my windows and easy to use! It allows light in but not sue. I love the fact that you can see figures but not actually see through this.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Nice pattern
customer_reviews.text: Hard to match pattern when needing to cut another piece to put next to it but easy to installed. Delivery was quick .
customer_reviews.author: dancingbluez

customer_reviews.title: Love it.........
customer_reviews.text: Love this privacy film. Was not hard to install at all. I had never done this before so I watched a video on youtube and it was really easy. I put this on a large bathroom window and it gives complete and total privacy even at night with the lights on, but lets the natural light in during the day. I am so glad I purchased this product, it has solved a big problem.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Wolf

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: Had pre white crease lines like little cuts all over when unrolled. Returning
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Works well and it’s cute.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter used it in a kitchen window that people could look inside and see her. She said it solved that problem and it’s cute and super easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Little tricky to get the hang of, but it’s very beautiful and gives you some privacy.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: love the pattern
customer_reviews.text: love the pattern, easy to apply. it is the same material as the decorative window clings that you put up for holidays. a lot came on the roll. 1 sheet covered a sliding glass door. I ordered 2 rolls to cover both sides, and had a lot of extra.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca b.

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: Love this pattern. Very classy. I've gotte many compliments I've done 11 Windows in my house with this film.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The film was easy to install just following the instructions
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my shower doors for a little privacy. The film was easy to install just following the instructions. The only thing I would add is I felt it helpful to wet the film as well as the glass I was applying it too. It looks great!!!
customer_reviews.author: P-nut's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Relatively easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Relatively easy to install. I was definitely better on the second installation than the first. Gives me the privacy I want without taking away the light during the day. I love that I can have the lights on inside at night and still have complete privacy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brings a window out!
customer_reviews.text: I buy these all the time.. very cute, decorative and keeps the eyes out...lol absolutely love this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Pinklliippsspop

customer_reviews.title: stays on in shower
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my master shower on the inside and it has been staying on no problem! pretty easy install for one person, just needs patience.
customer_reviews.author: Soli

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on the windows...
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to apply and I love it! Perfect and exactly what I was looking for. Let's the light in while giving privacy.
customer_reviews.author: Lorri

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!
customer_reviews.text: I recently installed this on a window that looks into my office. I was really easy to install and looks so nice. One of my colleagues mentioned it looks like I had the glass professionally etched. I've gotten several compliments and have shared the link with other coworkers because they want the same product. It made such a drastic difference to my office.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: So Pleased!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am soon pleased w/ this product!!! It was super easy to install and is exactly the look I wanted. It even came w/ a small razor and lint- free cloth. The privacy level is perfect, allowing light to come in but outsiders cannot see inside the house. I would recommend this product to any body.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this stuff! Works great & is easy to use! I would suggest it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: MamaB81

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Needed some privacy for my bathroom windows and this makes them look really nice. It was easy to install. I have had it for 6 months now and it looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I bought it to put on my front door to get privacy but still that lighting and it's doing the job exactly as I expect it.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I used on shower doors, and it is so beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Lois

customer_reviews.title: Clings good looks good
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful had people ask if window was made like this
customer_reviews.author: Libby

customer_reviews.title: I love this window film
customer_reviews.text: I love this window film. It's beautiful on my window. Minus one star because it was so hard to get the backing off. You should have seen me, it was hilarious!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Privacy!
customer_reviews.text: This looks amazing on my back door and alows me to have some privacy from the neigbors!!!! Was easy to install......just needs anout 3 hands to do it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful on bottom half of storm door .easy to apply .stays on
customer_reviews.author: RN

customer_reviews.title: I would purchase this again.
customer_reviews.text: I would purchase this again. It looks wonderful on the windows. I have privacy without blocking all of the natural light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Is great and looks beautiful. It gives a really nice touch. Getting more for my bathroom window.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I did not want to be able to see in from the outside and II wanted the inside to look nice. It installed easily and sticks very
customer_reviews.text: I needed it for my motor home window. I did not want to be able to see in from the outside and II wanted the inside to look nice. It installed easily and sticks very well. No problems peeling at the edges or anywhere else. Looked exactly like i expected it too. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: So easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: This turned out to be everything I hoped for. So easy to apply. The design looks great. I used it on window by computer it still lets sunshine through but now I have privacy from next door. I can also be in my jammies.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, fast shipping, easy to apply. Satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Used on a large sliding glass door so there was just enough on the large roll for trimming. Easy enough to apply, probably much easier on a smaller window or door. Came with instructions, a small ruler, trimming blade and small cloth.
customer_reviews.author: KC Chronister

customer_reviews.title: It’s easier than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: It came with tools I need to apply the film. So it’s make it easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Yukari K.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty privacy
customer_reviews.text: It arrived quickly. Looks nice. Let's enough light in while providing privacy. It can be a little tricky to cut to size and apply.
customer_reviews.author: L.C.

customer_reviews.title: Hassle-free solution for privacy concern
customer_reviews.text: Great for added privacy on the frosted window in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: ChelleB

customer_reviews.title: This was easy to install and works great
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to install and works great. Sticks just fine and lets enough light through without compromising our privacy.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Mcmahon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my front door windows. Directions were easy to follow, super easy to install. Worked perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Platt

customer_reviews.title: Not what expected
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put up but when I put it up you are right you can't see in but also you can't see out this was suppose to be where you can see out and not in not what it said

customer_reviews.title: Striking when completed!
customer_reviews.text: Take your time and do it right. Outcome is awesome! Don't hesitate! Sticks perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Used on my bathroom window. Nobody can see in but it still lets light in. Very pretty

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the film it works perfectly goes on just as easy as they said and looks beautiful

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product! Easy to apply! Love the look! Applied it to a full-window exterior door. Comes with all the tools you need including a small razor knife.
customer_reviews.author: Gary B

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the window next to my classroom door so I could still have natural light.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this! I was looking for a window privacy to cover the sliding doors in my room leading to the patio and this worked perfectly. It looks professional and beautifully done. It was extremely easy to apply. I totally recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephany Chit

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The film arrived promptly and was in great condition. Easy to install and provides the privacy needed. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Measure 1/2inch larger, place product, trim in place to fit exactly.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! As you can see I used it to cover mirrored closet doors.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This came out absolutely beautiful and gives the privacy we were looking for.

customer_reviews.title: not at all easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: good luck getting ALL the bubbles out. i worked on it for hours getting all water and air out. looks great but not at all easy to do.

product_meta.title: DUOFIRE Window Film Privacy Window Film Frosted Glass Film No Glue Static Cling Glass Film Anti-UV Window Sticker for Bathroom Bedroom Living Room (Black Flower-DP014B, 23.6in. x 78.7in.)
feature_bullets: 【Privacy Protection】This decorative window film can Instantly change your see-through glass into a Black Flower Pattern frosted glass panels. Provides Privacy and Allows the Lights in.Privacy Level :★★★★★ Top Private Window Films (Outstanding Privacy Protection Even Works For Bathrooms). Widely Suitable For Any Places: Kitchen, Bedroom, Bathroom, Living Room, Dining Room, Office, Hotels, Classroom, Lobby, etc.

【Easy Application】You only need some clear water (soapy water would be better) to apply it. DON'T forget to remove backing protective film before putting on glass (Detail instructions, please see the Product Description).
【Reusable Static Cling】This window film is no-glue, easy to position and remove without any residue or any harmful substances release. So it can be reused if not damaged or smudged.

【Anti-UV Window Cling】Keep heat out in summer and retain it in winter comfort. Control heat, block out more than 96% of harmful UV Rays, stop the staffs in door from fading and aging. Made by premium vinyl material which has been designed to withstand heat and steam for long lasting quality.

【Package Include】1 roll of window film; 1 piece of instruction; 1 piece of professional stainless steel film cutter; 1 piece of stainless steel ruler; 1 piece of cleaning cloth. Please Make sure window surface is completely clean and absolutely free of any blemishes, and tear off the outside protection film before you post the privacy window film on the smooth surface. Easy to cut into any size to meet your special demands.
